articles.title: Cape Town facility could produce Africa's first Covid-19 mRNA vaccines within 15 months - News24
articles.description: A facility in Cape Town could produce Africa’s first vaccines using messenger RNA, the breakthrough science of the global inoculation effort against Covid-19, within 15 months of signing a technology transfer agreement.
